CustomField.description: Field is used to denote some NewsAdds products to be allocated to NewsXtend revenue. Few products will have a value selected, most will be marked as None. Data Services will advise if a product needs to be marked for revenue attribution.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Field is used to denote some NewsAdds products to be allocated to NewsXtend revenue. Few products will have a value selected, most will be marked as None. Data Services will advise if a product needs to be marked for revenue attribution.
CustomField.label: Revenue Attribution
